meaningMnemonic: If you try to <kanji>call</kanji> upon someone by <kanji>scream</kanji>ing for them, you're probably trying to <vocabulary>summon</vocabulary> them. It's a little bit more serious than just calling them over casually. Maybe you're summoning someone to court, or summoning a magical creature in a video game. Pretty serious stuff.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
